BodyType.description: The body type or style of the vehicle, such as hatchback, SUV, or coupe.

BusinessBrandId.description: The ID of a Business Brand record related to a vehicle model.

BusinessBrandName.description: The name of the business brand related to a vehicle model.

DoorCount.description: The number of doors in the vehicle model, such as 2 or 4.

DoorStyle.description: The door style of the vehicle.

DrivetrainSystem.description: The drivetrain system implemented in the vehicle.

EmissionStandard.description: The emission standard applicable to the vehicle, such as EURO 5, or LEV.

EngineCapacity.description: The engine capacity of the vehicle model, such as 1900 cc.

FuelSource.description: The power source used in the vehicle.

GeoCountryId.description: The Geo Country code associated with the specific vehicle model and variant.

GeoCountryName.description: The country associated with the specific vehicle model and variant.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the associated location was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the associated location was last viewed.

ListPrice.description: The price of the vehicle definition configured in the price book entry.

MainBatteryType.description: The type of battery used in the vehicle, such as Lithium Ion, or gel cell battery (Dry Cell).

MakeName.description: The make name of a vehicle.

ModelName.description: The model name of a vehicle.

ModelVersionName.description: The version name associated with the vehicle model.

ModelYear.description: The model year of a vehicle.

Name.description: The name of the vehicle definition searchable field.

OwnerId.description: The owner ID of the vehicle definition searchable field.

PriceBookEntryId.description: The ID of the Price Book Entry record related to the product.

ProductCode.description: The unique code of a Product record related to the vehicle model.

ProductFamily.description: The product family to which a vehicle belongs.

ProductId.description: The ID of the Product record related to a vehicle defintion.

ProductImageUrl.description: The URL to the image of a product.

TopSpeed.description: The highest speed the vehicle model can achieve.

TransmissionSystem.description: The transmission type of the vehicle.

TrimType.description: The trim type of the vehicle model, such as DX, GT,or LS.

UniversalProductCode.description: The universal product code used to track the part used in the product.

VariantName.description: The variant of a specific vehicle, such as LS or XD.

VehicleClass.description: The classification or category of the vehicle such as sport, utility, or sedan.

VehicleDefinitionId.description: The ID of the Vehicle Definition record.

VehicleDefinitionName.description: The name of the vehicle definition related to a vehicle.
